story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hey, what did you think about that speech?
story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Isn’t it a bit much to be thinking about a problem
that might happen a millennium from now?
story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_0300_10:
We need to avoid a future where we fight over
limited resources...
story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_0400_10:
And we should probably think about what to
do—even if it is about the distant future.
story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_0500_10: See? Even the professor says so!
story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_0600_10: Hold on, I don’t agree with everything he said...
story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_0700_10: Hey, don’t you agree with what Mr. Rose said?
story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Yeah, if it can make our lives better, then it’s
probably a good idea!
story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_0900_10:
But I don’t think it’s a good idea to have only
one person managing all of the sync stones...
story_galar_01_13000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Don’t be a fool! Mr. Rose is thinking seriously
about the future of the world!
